description: Executes a process. This is useful for user-defined processes which should be able to execute different processes based on the user input.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The identifier for the process to be executed.

parameters.name: arguments
parameters.description: The arguments passed to the process.

parameters.name: namespace
parameters.description:
The namespace of the process.

Defaults to `null`, which checks both user-defined and predefined processes, but prefers user-defined processes if both are available.

returns.description: The data that is returned by the executed process.
